articles.title: Thiago and Harvey Elliott excuse will not wash for Liverpool as Andy Robertson let down vs Leeds - Liverpool.com
articles.description: The Good, Bad and Ugly: Liverpool lost to Leeds United in hapless fashion. Andy Robertson was a rare bright spark in a sea of below-par showings everywhere.
articles.content:
Liverpool have lost at Anfield. In front of fans. With Virgil van Dijk on the pitch. The proudest of records has fallen, and it is hard not to see it as a symbolic end of an era. 
But in truth, Jürg… [+5658 chars]
